title: Real-Time Collaborative Task Management App
description: A real-time collaborative task management system with user authentication, task prioritization, real-time updates, filtering, dashboard analytics, and mobile-responsive design for team productivity.
requirements: Implement user authentication with JWT tokens and refresh tokens
Support creation, editing, and deletion of tasks with priority levels (low, medium, high, urgent)
Enable task assignment to team members with real-time conflict resolution
Provide real-time updates for task modifications with 1s latency
Implement status filtering (todo/in-progress/completed), assignee filtering, and priority filtering
Generate dashboard metrics for task completion rates and team productivity
Add comment system with threaded replies for task collaboration
Support file attachments (images, documents) via AWS S3 integration
Send email notifications for task assignments and deadlines
Ensure mobile responsiveness for devices 320px and above
Implement dark mode toggle with theme persistence
acceptance_criteria: Real-time updates must trigger within 1 second of modification
System must handle 100+ concurrent users with stable performance
Mobile layout must render correctly on 320px+ screens
All forms must have server-side and client-side validation
Unit test coverage must reach 80%+ for all core functionality
ai_guidance: Implement WebSocket for real-time updates with message prioritization. Use JWT with refresh tokens for secure authentication. Design AWS S3 integration with signed URLs for file attachments. Implement dark mode with CSS variables and user preference storage. Ensure real-time updates use binary protocols for low latency.
